plot: Frank and Charlie find someone has pooped in their bed, leading Mac and Dennis to join them as they attempt to find the culprit.

After Charlie accuses Frank of crapping in his bed, Mac and Dennis get involved and stage an overnight observation to get to the bottom of this mystery in a case of "Who Pooped The Bed". Meanwhile, Dee, inspired by "Sex & The City", takes the Waitress and Artemis for a night on the town while Artemis figures out the subtleties of the poop mystery.—halo1k
